title: Thedeterminedaltcoin
author: Thedeterminedaltcoin
content: I know most of you are down during this bear market, your portfolio but also mentally, but I believe that even in times like these, it is important to adapt.Last year, like many of you, I had faded the meme coin explosion during the bull market.After these last 2 months of just terrible market conditions, I couldn't take it anymore and looked in these meme coins to understand how they work.In short, it's all hype and thin air, absolutely, but the huge advantage is that they do not depend on Bitcoin, but their community.Coins like Shib, Safemoon & BabyDoge that went to billions, others to hundreds of millions in market cap, 18 year old kids made millions out of it, but why?The reason Doge, Shib, BabyDoge more have done so well is because of 3 things:- Funny meme that can unite people (everyone loves cute dogs)- A strong community with a common goal (For Doge it was to mock Bitcoin and beat it, for Shib it was to Beat Doge, BabyDoge was to become Doge’s son)- High Viral potential, the memes and stickers carried this on every social mediaThis is all what meme coins are about, and i think that Panda Elon combines all the quality I've mentioned above:- Combines the biggest meme in China (Panda Biao Qing) + Crypto’s biggest personality (Elon Musk)- Chinese, Vietnamese and English community united to accomplish one goal: Becoming the first Panda to reach $1 Billion Market cap- High viral potential with the meme being extremely famous in China and the stickers are just hilarious: https://t.me/addstickers/PandaElonTheir marketing is also a lot different than most meme coins, instead of just focusing on Telegram call channels, Twitter, Coingecko and Coinmarketcap listings they will also use neglected areas such as Reddit, TikTok, YouTube but also Weibo & Wechat for the Asian Side, but mainly using their community to gain free exposure with the virality of the meme.To build a strong community, they are currently doing a $5000 + Whitelist spots Giveaway to the best members of their Army group, I’ll put the links below.Also something very smart that they have done, they are giving away a $1000 Bonus to anyone that can get Panda Elon viral on any social media.The presale will be on the 2nd of July with a small Hardcap of 100 BNB, I believe that anyone who enters it will make a lot of money, but it’s going to be a gas war.I genuinely think that Panda Elon can go very far, their unique meme with its viral potential added to their international communities make it a no brainer for me.This of course is not financial advise, but please do not be lazy and check the links below and see for yourself how far this can go:Site: https://pandaelon.com/TG: https://t.me/PandaElon$5000 + WL Army group: https://t.me/PandaelonarmyPresale link: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x1Cfc251457A4f07d21f605EAAb0c883110b9AB2d?chain=BSC

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Another useless, worthless meme coin that tries to PR on Ilon Musk? I think there were already some related to Elon and if anyone knows, have they gone under or are they still holding on? I looked at the tokenomics of the project, it says about 20% of proposals, but where is the other 80%? Something tells me that the developers themselves, who have prepared them for sale to hamsters at inflated prices.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on June 27, 2022, 09:49:37 PMAnother useless, worthless meme coin that tries to PR on Ilon Musk? I think there were already some related to Elon and if anyone knows, have they gone under or are they still holding on? I looked at the tokenomics of the project, it says about 20% of proposals, but where is the other 80%? Something tells me that the developers themselves, who have prepared them for sale to hamsters at inflated prices.This remind me of Elongate, lol.  I remember that token riding the popularity of Elon Musk during the outbreak of worthless and scam meme just to ride the popularity of Shib and Doge market surging like crazy.Quotebut where is the other 80%?Possible it is being held in preparation for dump when the hype kicked in and the price skyrocketed to 1000x+.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: oh shit, you created this thread to publicize this shitcoin and worse that you still think that china will be pleased to see some shitcoin doing well using the name and design of their dearest animal, on the contrary the government of china doesn't like it cryptocurrencies are not going to like this news, maybe they will even take some legal action against the creators of this shitcoin and about musk being in it, honestly I wonder why the hell is he supporting these things that are useless? why are people wasting time and money on this kind of useless altcoins? greed?

comments.author: Jatiluhung
comments.body: I applaud your delivery method regarding this panda Elon meme coin. So I'm also interested in checking the telegram group you linked. but looking at the new community around 2000 members. and I'm not interested in joining yet. However, the potential of meme coins cannot be underestimated. but the main strength of the meme coin is its promotion and marketing. because no matter how solid the community is, if the team is not good at promoting and building hype then I've recently seen a lot of meme coins run aground in the middle of the road. But because panda Elon is still new. So I think it's worth continuing to review. because if the team is good at creating hype and the community is solid. then it is possible that this meme coin will fly. but if the team is not good at creating and building hype then this will end up like any other meme coin that is born and blown by the wind for a moment and thrown to the ground.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: another way of cheap advertising and is this serves as your ANN Thread? because you have posted only 2 posts and both are same content in which shilling for this project.like the first post? another worthless project that we will never dare to invest , and surely wont gather any support from the bitcointalk community .

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: Thedeterminedaltcoin on June 27, 2022, 09:17:43 PMtl;drI will not buy a meme coin that is associated with Elon Musk or anything that has his name on it. I will not also buy a shitcoin or a memecoin like this one.I just hope that newbie investors will not try and gamble their money and invest into this meme coin because they are other and better projects out there that is worth investing your money with. Good Luck with the OP I guess but I will not try to invest even a single cent to this shitty project that has a high chance to be a scam project.

comments.author: slaman29
comments.body: If you have to ask, then you either trolling or shitposting or shilling. No offense, and always giving benefit of doubt, but I'm ready to bet money on that, even if you'll come and defend it.There are enough people suffering in the market already so no need to push them all the way like this to get even more in the red.Or go and buy as much memecoins as you can and exit the market so we get a cleaner ecosystem.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: What the heck is wrong with OP by connecting this useless meme coin the current bear market. He gives a brief history of the meme coin success few years ago which is quite funny. Meme coin has no real utility in global economy and the only thing good about this coin is none.  Panda Elon, Moon Elon and other meme coin that using Elon to gain attention is the real cancer of crypto which shares the marketcap while this coin is a complete garbage at all.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Elon frills have always been something that seems to be considered extraordinary among meme coins Altcoins whose current project is clearly currently having a hard time, why waste money for coins that are not clear in terms of quality or quantity.I don't even want to see what they have to offer in the Roadmap or Whitepaper because this is the same as wasting my time on useless things.

comments.author: VRExpress
comments.body: What the F is panda elon again? 😂😂😂 you people won't stop wasting your hard earned money on shitcoins, see the fact is meme coins were able to perform well because of a bull market, wait thing BTC goes below 19,000$ you will see the ugly side of shitcoins, they will start losing everything and eventually die.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Scam elon token that issued by scammers who think that can steal money from the investors again and again. That's enough to see that your scam token being shilled in here. It's better if you are spending your money for a better thing rather than issuing the new scam token like that. This cost some money and then it can be used to buy a burger on mcd rather than wasting your money to scam others again and again. Scammers, are you never feeling bored to scam others? Does your life is about creating more and more scam token?

comments.author: Thedeterminedaltcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Jatiluhung on June 28, 2022, 02:58:23 AMI applaud your delivery method regarding this panda Elon meme coin. So I'm also interested in checking the telegram group you linked. but looking at the new community around 2000 members. and I'm not interested in joining yet. However, the potential of meme coins cannot be underestimated. but the main strength of the meme coin is its promotion and marketing. because no matter how solid the community is, if the team is not good at promoting and building hype then I've recently seen a lot of meme coins run aground in the middle of the road. But because panda Elon is still new. So I think it's worth continuing to review. because if the team is good at creating hype and the community is solid. then it is possible that this meme coin will fly. but if the team is not good at creating and building hype then this will end up like any other meme coin that is born and blown by the wind for a moment and thrown to the ground.Thank you for being open minded unlike all the other posts on here  They just keep repeating the same posts that I already acknowledged: no utility and based on marketing and hype, but they just repeat the same things to justify why meme coins are a scam to feel better  The reality is there were hundreds of millions of dollars made (and lost as well) during the meme coin rush, whether you like it or not, many people got extremely wealthy (and yes, many lost a lot of money, guess what? same exact thing happens in bitcoin and top 10 altcoins, shocker I know).I applaud you for taking the time to check out the community, I can guarantee you from what I've seen so far that the team is very good at hyping and marketing, but I would go as far and say that even if they were horrible at doing it, I believe that this meme will sell itself.They have a lot of activity on social media (Twitter, TikTok and even Reddit) and this is unlike many many other meme coins out there that just depend on a few call channels to post them and call it a day.The presale is on the 2nd of July, 4 days left to build up more hype and momentum, we'll see how it goes

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: In a bear market, you need to buy fundamental assets, not unknown altcoins, the price of which can drop very much.It is better to invest in Ethereum, Cosmos, Polkadot and similar coins, and for risky investments, allocate 3-5% of your investment portfolio.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Well, the crypto world is crazy! After seeing Dogecoin's performance in the past years, and what some other meme coins have done, I am not sure can I advise anyone to not invest in these coins... the fact is that some people made huge profits! And who can dare to say that some new meme coin can do the same? And be 100% sure about that? I know I can't! I saw to many crazy things happening around!But what I can advise is to not invest too much! Have fun with some meme coins, why not? But only with the money you can afford to lose! If things go the wrong way you will not get hurt... if by some chance your meme coin goes x1000 in the next years you will have some nice profit and be satisfied with that! It's the strategy for the long run, the safe one...

comments.author: bakasabo
comments.body: Topic starter, you are wasting your time. The time of meme coins is gone. You wont amaze anyone with an altcoin that has Elon or Mask in its name and is related to animal. Such tricks could have worked in the last year only. All you do now is shilling another scam. Buying this alt means loosing money. It will never cost more than its sales price. After "sales"  this super project will disappear. In fact, the pages was created 16 days ago. This meme coin is created by one person that will vanish as soon as he gets first money.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: Please do tell me who are those kids that are millionaires now. Let's have an example so it won't look fake. Another meme. Another no use but yet there are those being urged to support it just because of a promise of millions in profits. That's why other projects that have real good goals won't advance because of this. Money is being diversified instead of them getting that enormous amount of share.This is the worst era of cryptocurrencies in my opinion. Investors easily believe such things and would not even make their research anymore. It should stop. I bought Shiba before but just for the purpose of having fun trading it which I think is what it's all about but never to an extent of holding it for long like Bitcoin or Ethereum. Never.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: There are no good meme coins, especially with the name Elon, I think this will be a useless shitcoin forever, remember this is just a trap, don't trust too much, especially during bearish times, it's all useless.How many meme coins with the name Elon already? Is it all promising, man, this will be a hype trap that will be thrown away for me, don't ever be fooled by a meme coin with the name Elon, it's all just dev profits, while investors will be whacked forever.
